name: ココロクローバー パート2/Kokoro Clover Part2
name_original: ココロクローバー パート2/Kokoro Clover Part2
description:
（machine translation）
This is the second in the "Sunday Morning Anime" x "Casual Difficulty Side-scroller" series of "Kokoro Clover! New characters, new stage scenarios, and five episodes of special move action.
This series can be enjoyed by children and those who are not good at action.
Play time: 2 hours to 2.5 hours.

Assist, dance, and collect unleashed assists, dances, and collections while completing the story mode and challenge mode inspired by the atmosphere of "Sunday Morning Anime.
Opening up is what this game is all about.
It can be played by children and those who are not good at action.

Number of stories
Kokoro Clover Episode 2 "I Am No More Death
Kokoro Clover Episode 3 "Evil Spirit Dispit
Kokoro Clover Episode 4 "Library Boy!
Kokoro Clover Episode 5 "Hot Trolley!
Kokoro Clover Episode 6 - Volcano! Cyclone Warning!



You can play in the Story Mode, which is based on a 30-minute anime, in the Challenge Mode, which has a boss waiting for you at the end of the stage, in the Library Mode, and in the Shop Mode, where you can collect coins and stickers from the stages.

In the stages, players can use "transformation" to change the attributes and appearance, "assist" to summon friends, "dance" to perform unique motions at any time, and "special" to perform cut-in special moves to let players perform bright and free actions.

The game's style is similar to that of watching "Sunday Morning Anime" on rent.
Experience the fun atmosphere of pixel graphics.
